document.full_text: barely audible above the chants of "traitor," an israeli actress who lost a leg in a palestinian attack read out on thursday a declaration by israeli intellectuals endorsing the creation of a palestinian state.
document.title: israeli intellectuals endorse palestinian state
lines_and_colors: barely audible above the chants of "traitor," an israeli actress who lost a leg in a palestinian attack read out on thursday a declaration by israeli intellectuals endorsing the creation of a palestinian state.
